subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Playing to a soundtrack of appreciative roars, the seven-time All-Star Tracy McGrady played 32 minutes and  had 26 points, 5 assists and 4 rebounds.
snippet: Playing to a soundtrack of appreciative roars, the seven-time All-Star Tracy McGrady played 32 minutes and  had 26 points, 5 assists and 4 rebounds.
